title: Nidalee patch notes proves riot plays favorites
body:
It blatantly states they are more than happy to hold off nerfs for  ~~specific champions~~ their poster childs and "wait it out", yet they are more than willing to pile up 3-4 simultaneous nerfs on some champs they don't like.

Here, they say "Yeah, {{champion:76}} is problematic, but since we are buffing tanks well wait and see".

Meanwhile

"Even though we are nerfing mana regen across the board in S5, nerfing {{item:3174}} , and removing DFG from the game, instead of waiting it out and see how it develops, we are going to nerf both {{champion:134}} 's Q and EQ stun radius. I'm sure she'll be fine"

or

"Even though we are nerfing mana regen across the board in S5, and nerfing {{item:3174}} , we are going to hit  {{champion:268}} 's Q damage, W range and W damage to turrets, all at once, instead of giving him one nerf and see how it plays out. I'm sure he'll be fine"

Balanced is focused around how the game is currently played. Nidalee is currently strong in the jungle, so buffing weaker junglers might fix the problem and that's what they're waiting to see. If you buff weak junglers and nerf Nidalee, she might not be able to compete anymore and they would just end up reversing the nerf. Nerfing a champion is basically the same exact thing as buffing every other champion, and buffing one champion is the same as nerfing every other champion. If she ends up needing a nerf still then she'll get it, relax.

Are we really upset if Nidalee can't compete anymore though?  She wasn't even supposed to be a jungler in the first place.  Her kit is obnoxious and the enemy rarely has any interaction with her unless it's because she got lucky with a spear and is jumping in to blow them up in .5 seconds.  Why does she get to have the long-range damage of a poke mage, the sustain of a bruiser and the mobility/burst of an assassin?   Her kit needs a rework.  Just because she's not going to be in-meta right not doesn't make her well-designed.  It just means her counters will be popular so she won't be.  Once tank-meta passes, she'll be right back to where she was last patch and people will start complaining about her again.
